        public boolean outOfTime

    • Constructor Detail

      • Search

        public Search(lejos.robotics.SampleProvider ultraSonic,
              Odometer odo,
              Navigate nav,
              double llx,
              double lly,
              double urx,
              double ury,
              lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
              lejos.hardware.motor.EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
              DetectColor col,
              int targetColour)
        Creates the search class, which enables the robot to createa 2-d map of the search area, with all blocks included within it
        Parameters:
        ultraSonic - - the ultrasonic sensor
        odo - - the odometer object
        nav - - the navigation object
        llx - - x position on the grid of the lower left corner of the search area
        lly - - y position on the grid of the lower left corner of the search area
        urx - - x position on the grid of the upper right corner of the search area
        ury - - y position on the grid of the upper right corner of the search area
        leftMotor - - the left EV3 motor
        rightMotor - - the right EV3 motor
        col - - a colour detection object from the detectColour package
        targetColour - - a number between 1 and 4, representing the colour of the object (blue = 1, red = 2, yellow = 3, white = 4)

    • Method Detail

      • probe

        public int probe(int targetColour)
        Drives to each object saved in the 2-d map, in order to identify colour
        Parameters:
        targetColour - - an int corresponding to a blue, red, yellow or white block

      • start

        public boolean start(boolean prevTaskSuccess)
        Enables the robot to travel to each corner of the search area, and then probe for blocks afterwards
        Specified by:
        start in interface Task

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Task
